Welcome! This is a pure fetish-based story centering on the hyper-pregnancy kink. Essentially, hyper-pregnancy is the fantasy of someone having an excessive amount of babies in a single pregnancy. (Six or above.)

Mainly female characters will be the focus, but because I'm understanding, male pregnancy will be allowed. (Plz tag in the title, it's not everybody's thing.)

Anyway! To start things off, let's start with what type of media you'd like to focus on!
1.title: The Breedening Begins!

11.title: Anime (Tenchi/MonMusu/One Piece/Ranma)

choices: She accidentally left an automatic fertility drug dispenser on...
An alien she had been observing makes its way into the world...
Tenchi is a god of creation, meaning he needs to create life...
111.content:
"So..." Tenchi said softly, relaxing in the hot springs as the naked Ryoko and Ayeka cuddled up to him, both space pirate and princess giggling happily.

"So you don't have any excuse anymore for turning us down," Ryoko said, almost purring.

"You're married to all of us. And you have certain responsibilities as a husband," Ayeka said.

Tenchi just looked at them. "And you two have responsibilities as a wife," he said. "No more fighting."

Ryoko and Ayeka cast glares at each other... but relented. "Of course, dearest," Ayeka said.

"Just pranks from now on, I promise," Ryoko said.

Nearby, Tenchi's other wives, Sasami, Washu, Mihoshi and Noike sat in the steamy hot water, chuckling to themselves.

"Those two won't ever quit, will they?" Noike asked.

Washu snorted. "Ryoko just said she'd keep to pranks. That's something of a miracle in itself," she said.

Mihoshi was in bliss. "I'mma princess now!" she giggled.

Sasami, Ryo-Ohki resting on her head, just smiled. This really was peaceful. But still... "Miss Kiyone?"

There was a squeak from behind one of the rocks. "Princess Sasami?" said a voice. A woman in a Juraian guard uniform came out, her long green hair held out of her face by a headband.

Mihoshi smiled. "Kiyone, come on and join us! I've missed you!" she said.

Kiyone Makibi sighed. Ever since she had nearly died on one of Washu's old bases, she had wanted revenge on Mihoshi for her blithering idiocy. But now she didn't dare touch her. For one thing, her new partner was favored by the scary and powerful politician Seto Kamiki. Secondly, she was now married to Prince Tenchi, heir to the throne, who apparently was absurdly powerful as well. She had been recovered by the Galaxy Police, but as soon as she was, she was assigned as bodyguard for the royal family. Meaning she had to be around Mihoshi constantly. She had given up her plans for revenge and just prayed nothing weird happened to her.

"Princess, it's not appropriate for me to..." Kiyone started to say.

"Kiyone," Tenchi said. "Save the titles for when we're in public. If you live here, you're part of the family."

"Yeah, c'mon copper!" Ryoko said, pouring herself some sake. "Join us! You need to melt that stick up your ass!"

Kiyone fumed.

Ayeka giggled. "While I disagree with Ryoko's phrasing, you do seem overly tense. Join us."

"I'm your guard!" Kiyone protested.

"So bring your sidearm," Noike said.

"This isn't proper procedure..." Kiyone protested.

Mihoshi got out of the water and hugged her. "We aren't all proper princesses," she said.

"I am!" Ayeka said. Ryoko splashed her.

Kiyone sighed, giving up. "Okay, okay... Just let me get to the shower area to clean up..." she said.

Once she was done, she came out to join the others in the bathing pool, wrapped in a towel.

"Nope, no towels," Ryoko said, levitating Kiyone's towel away. The police officer turned bodyguard squeaked and blushed, covering herself.

"Kiyone dear, you have nothing to be ashamed of," Ayeka said, her cheeks red from the sake she was drinking. "Now come. I want Master Tenchi surrounded by beautiful naked women."

Ryoko snickered. "All this time protesting me throwing myself at Tenchi and now you want MORE gorgeous women around him."

Tenchi just blushed, a little drunk himself, which was why he hadn't apologized to Kiyone yet.

Ayeka grinned. "This is a happy time," she said. "Master Tenchi saved the universe more than once, and is now married. If I say I want him surrounded by the seven most beautiful women in the galaxy, then he'll be surrounded by the seven most beautiful women in the galaxy."

"She's including you in the seven, by the way," Noike said. Kiyone blushed again.

"So come on!" Ryoko said to Kiyone. "Uncover yourself and come in the water. I promise you that we'll keep Tenchi from molesting you."

"Indeed," Ayeka said. "I want him molesting US."

Tenchi giggled.

Kiyone blushed. "Well... I suppose it couldn't hurt," she said. She still had her weapon, so she could defend them if need be. Plus, it felt nice to be called one of the most beautiful women in the galaxy...

Washu smiled as Kiyone joined them in the water. After a few drinks, she and Noike were sharing Mihoshi stories, the blonde oblivious to the fact that they were basically insulting her. She sighed, content. Her sister Tokimi was inhabiting the shrine, and her other sister Tsunami was sharing a body with young Sasami. Life was good... although she couldn't help but think that she was forgetting something very important...
111.title: Tenchi Muyo!

choices: Follow the story from just after Smith left the Kurusu household...
Back in the city, Ms. Smith gets a phone call from Kimihito...
Ms. Smith and the four MON girls are secretly dosed with the fertility drug...
112.content:
"Group marriage?" Kimihito Kurusu asked. Around him, his seven monstergirl companions looked rather interested.

Kuroko Smith nodded. "Yeah, this is actually something I took initiative on. I tracked down and talked to each of your families..."

"Wait," Rachnee said, the arachne visibly confused. "How do you know where my family lives? I've never mentioned them before."

Suu spoke up next, the slime looking confused. "Also, Suu technically doesn't have parents..."

Ms. Smith sipped her coffee. "When you registered for the hosting program, we did it from your original home, remember?" she asked, amused.

Rachnee facepalmed, annoyed with herself for not realizing that.

Ms. Smith smiled. "As for you, Suu..." She sighed. "We don't know much about slimes yet. So right now we're counting this group here as your family."

Suu beamed happily, Papi hugging her.

Miia, however, was pouting, the lamia's tail flicking back and forth. "Can we get back to the point?" the redheaded beauty asked.

Ms. Smith nodded. "Anyway. Because Kimihito's been such a sweetheart, he's become sort of a poster boy for the hosting program. Especially for hosting less humanoid liminals."

Kimihito blushed as all the monstergirls in the room shot him adoring looks. "I'm... It's just being nice, is all. Being a good host."

Ms. Smith gave him a serious look. "Kimihito, you've inspired people to take in less humanoid breeds of liminal. Hosting for lamias, centaurs, and arachne-types has gone up just from people HEARING about how well you're getting along with your girls here. And on top of that..." She sipped her coffee. "You're clearly in love with all seven of them, you're just too scared of hurting anyone's feelings to focus on one or the other."

"...Yeah, you're right," Kimihito admitted, startling everyone.

"Darling?" Miia said hopefully.

Kimihito chuckled, leaning back in his chair. "Ever since you girls have come into my life, I've never had a dull moment. Even despite all the accidental injuries and near-death experiences that everyone except Rachnee has inflicted on me..." he said. Rachnee smirked at this, while the other girls flinched. Kimihito continued. "I can't imagine my life without ANY of you now. Miia's vivaciousness and honest affection, Papi's innocence, Cerea's sense of honor, Suu's simple joy of life, Mero's nobility, Rachnee's cleverness and cunning, Lala's patience..." He blushed, and added. "Plus, you think with all the accidental flashing I get around here that I'd get desensitized to all the sexy. Thankfully, that hasn't happened!"

Everyone giggled at that, the monstergirls all feeling their affection for Kimihito growing after his admission.

Kimihito sighed. "I just... I didn't want to ruin all the friendships you all had," he said, grimacing and adding, "You girls are scary when you get angry."

The girls all flinched again. Mero looked thoughtful for a moment, and said, "Ms. Smith. You said you had talked to our families... Was it about all of us marrying Kimihito at once?"

Everyone stared. Ms. Smith reached into her pocket and pulled out a folded up paper. She unfolded it and put it down on the table. "Like I said, Kimihito, you've been a godsend to the hosting program. The LEAST I can do after dumping so much on you is ease one of the burdens on you." She smiled. "I had to get this made special, and do some major fast-talking with the judges involved... All you eight have to do is sign it and you'll be legally married. Any ceremonies you want can be held later, and I personally will foot the bill."

Kimihito blinked. "Wow, really?"

Rachnee frowned. "How?"

Ms. Smith grinned. "I got a big promotion AND I won a crapton of cash in the lottery! Recognition of my work at last! I'm in a good mood so I feel like doing nice things for people I like!" she said.

Rachnee nodded, smirking. That made more sense...

Everyone stared at the paper. The monstergirls all wanted Kimihito for themselves, but... All of them, even simple-minded Papi and Suu, realized that this was the best, if not only option. Anything else would end up with someone hurt. They'd all come to love each other too much...

Kimihito, startling them all, was the first to sign. The monstergirls all looked at each other again... and slowly smiled, coming to a decision. One by one, each one of them signed the marriage license.

They would become a family for real.

"Excellent!" Ms. Smith said. "Incidentally, this means that the restriction against having sex with ya girls here has been lifted."

Kimihito blushed, his nose bleeding a little. "That has occurred to me, yes," he said. Miia and Rachnee traded wicked looks.

Ms. Smith chuckled, pocketing the marriage license. "Plus, as you're all still technically part of the hosting program, all future food and medical expenses will be covered by us as per usual. I'll just go get this filed. Incidentally," she said, "Any marriage ceremonies are gonna have to wait at least a month. Me and the rest of MON have a mission in the Hokkaido area that will keep us busy for that whole time."

"Anything serious?" Cerea asked.

Ms. Smith shrugged, finishing her coffee. "Possibly. We're investigating a pharmecutical company which may have been putting drugs in people's food and water," she said. "We should be fine, though."

"Be careful," Kimihito said.

Ms. Smith smiled as she left, returning the coffee cup. "Thanks," she said. "See you lovelies later!"

/////////
A month later...
Hokkaido...
/////////

Tio, in her massive mech-suit, broke down the door, charging through the gunfire of the guards shooting at her. Zombina, who had been riding on her back, leaped into the air and attacked, doing impressive spins and cackling madly as she fired her machine guns. Behind them, Ms. Smith, Manako, and Doppel charged in, along with a heavily armed crew.

They seized the building, shooting any guards they found dead, and capturing any scientists. Ms. Smith looked furious.

"Bastards," she muttered. "Did you think we wouldn't find out!?"

The scientists all cowered.

"What were they doing, anyway?" asked one of the combat crew. "All I knew about them is that they made an antigen that made zombie-types like Zombina here non-contagious."

"Why do you think I'm so damn pissed at them?" Zombina muttered. "They made it so I can be intimate with someone without killing them, made it so I don't have to be scared of myself, and then they pull this shit..."

"They were secretly infecting female liminals with fertility drugs," Doppel said, kicking one of the captured scientists. "Ones that made them pregnant with dozens of babies at once. They were planning on using the babies for their sick medical experiments, kidnapping the mothers..."

"Science cannot advance without sacrifice!" insisted once of the scientists. Doppel looked at him, showing him what her eyes really looked like. The man fainted, foaming at the mouth as his brain shattered from the impossible sight.

"Doppel, quit mind-raping them," Ms. Smith said, "We need some of them sane for trial."

"Fine..." Doppel said in almost a whiny tone.

Tio came up to the others, removing her helmet to reveal the adorable Oni within. "That's everyone, Ms. Smith," she said.

"Good..." Smith said. "Now. How do I access your list of victims?"

The scientists milled about, looking wary.

Manako sighed, closing her eye... and without opening it, shot one of the scientists in the head. She smiled sadly. "We only need some of you for trial. I really don't want to have to kill anyone more than I have to. So... please?" she asked.

A scientist with a dark spot on his trousers from where he had pissed himself in fear pointed to a computer, stammering out how to access it. "T-The drug should wear off in a month or two so long as they haven't had sex. It was designed for a temporary effect."

Ms. Smith nodded, and went over to the computer, accessing the list. "Okay," she said. "All of these are in the hosting program, so we should be... beee... beeeeeeeeee...." Ms. Smith whimpered. "Eeeeeeee...."

Curious, Doppel, Zombina, Tio, and Manako came over to look.

"Oh!" Tio said upon seeing what made Ms. Smith's brain break. "Oh my!"

Doppel and Zombina began laughing.

Manako eeped. "Didn't you just help those seven get married to their host last month?"

"So much paperwork..." Ms. Smith moaned, fainting.

The names on the list? Miia, Papi, Centorea Shianus, Suu, Princess Meroune Lorelei, Rachnera Arachnera, and Lala.
112.title: Daily Life with Monster Girls

choices: Along comes a pirate with a ship full of beautiful women...and one man...
113.content:
A single ship sailed through the ocean, heading towards legend. It was the Thousand Sunny, home of the Straw Hat Pirates.

"To adventure!" Luffy said, the hyperactive would-be Pirate King standing on top of the crows nest. Monkey D. Luffy was happy. Things were going great for his crew. They'd been having great adventures lately, and his friends had recently worked out some long-standing personal issues, so they were happy too. Supplies were high, the ship was in great condition... Life was good. All he needed was a new adventure to have now.

Below him, his crew milled about, preparing for their duties.

"The sea wind is perfect today," Nami said, the buxom, red-headed navigator smiling as she felt the breeze wash over her trim body. "Plus, it's looking like strong winds and clear skies for the next week." She had learned to read the weather from a society living in the sky. Clad only in a pair of tight fitting jeans and a top that was more like a bra than anything else, she smiled, looking over her maps, charting their next course.

Leaning over the bow was the ship's marksman, the long-nosed Usopp. He chuckled to himself, watching the horizon. He reflected idly on his old days, and how much he lied about his prowess... He flexed a muscle, kissing it. He was becoming a bad liar. Ever since joining the Straw Hat Pirates, he had become so strong he could actually do some of the things he lied about before! And he wouldn't have it any other wa.

The heavily scarred swordsman, Roronoa Zoro just chuckled, running a hand through his green hair as he cleaned and sharpened his three swords. "Had some good fighting lately. Challenging enough to be interesting without being a near disaster like one of the Yonkou," he said, referring to the super-powerful pirates who ruled the seas.

In the kitchens, Sanji Vinsmoke, former assassin turned master chef, was busy preparing breakfast. They'd had windfall both in supplies and money recently, and Sanji was making good use of it. Besides, in a kitchen serving food is where he felt he belonged. (Well, either that or in the arms of a beautiful woman, but he'd learned that Robin and Nami wouldn't be returning his advances. Never stopped him from flirting with them, though.)

In the medbay, the anthropomorphic reindeer and master physician Tony Tony Chopper was looking at his short, adorable self in the mirror. "I really do look like a plush toy," he said, finally accepting it. "Oh well..." It didn't matter that much. He was with people who loved him and respected his talents. He was content.

In the ship's innards, cybernetic shipwright Franky was checking the hull. He knew everything was all right, but it never hurt to check. Once he was certain everything was all right, he post, thrusting his arms upward and leaning to the side, touching his thick forearms together to make a star out of the tattoos there. "SUPER!" he crowed. "Okay! Things are good NOW. Time to see if they can be IMPROVED!" He pressed his metal nose, his bright blue hair switching from its usual pompadour to a mad scientist frizz. "Gotta look the part when I'm inventing!"

In her private quarters, Nico Robin was busy. And loving it. The archaelogist was using her Devil Fruit powers to create several arms and hands to take notes as she went over the Poneglyph rubbings she had gotten recently. She adored history, and was so very close to finding out the secrets behind the Poneglyphs, one of her lifelong dreams... She looked up towards the main deck, and smiled. She owed the Straw Hat Crew so much. She couldn't imagine her life without them now.

The final member of the crew, the ship's musician, Brook, danced around happily. The undead skeleton, respendent in suit and afro, was simply enjoying his unlife, playing his violin and filling the air with beautiful, happy music. He had gotten a second chance after his Devil Fruit allowed him to retake his body (although it had rotted to a skeleton by then), and had nothing but inspiration through every battle and hardship. He loved being a part of this crew, and would protect them with his life.

They were the Straw Hat Pirates. And they were the best.
113.title: One Piece

1132.content:
Just then, Ussop saw something in the distance. Taking out a telescope and peeking through, he saw it was a new island

"Hey guys, new island up ahead!", he called out.

Everyone came on to the main deck to see and immediately Luffy stood at the bow of the ship and called out excitedly, " Ooooh, let's land and check it out!"

Franky piped up from behind the wheel," Why not? We've been sailing for a while now, I think we could all use a bit of break on solid land."

"Then it's decided!" The captain yelled out with the same excitement.

Everyone couldn't help but smile at the rubber man's antics, though the two women had a sense of longing in theirs. To put it simply, both were greatly in love with him, Robin included.

They both have been so for a while, who wouldn't fall for someone who has done even a fraction of what Luffy has, despite his apparent idiocy.

He saved Nami from eight years of torment and numerous other maniacs they've fought. And saved Robin from twenty years of hated solitude and gave her a reason to live.

They truly loved him, and their hearts shattered when they saw his anguished face in the paper and then him sending the message to wait two years before they could all meet up. The affection only grew over time.

Nami hasn't said anything as of yet because she assumes Luffy wouldn't even know what she was talking about seeing how dense he acts, while Robin sees it wrong due to the ten year age difference between them.

But soon both would find the moment to confess.

What they didn't know was that other women had similar thoughts, or that they noticed each other. While some others were about to be affected regardless.

(SEVERAL MINUTES LATER)

The crew had come ashore, and as per usual, Luffy had jumped off to go exploring immediately. Some chuckled, some groaned.

Chopper and Ussop had gone off together to see if they can't find some near medical herbs or rare insects.

Zoro went to train in a more open space where he can't cause damage to the ship. Brook tagged along to make sure he didn't somehow get to the Sky Islands.

Nami was going so she could map the island with Robin as company. Of course Sanji wanted to tag along, but was quickly put down. The food supplies were topped off, so he didn't have to go. So he had to stay on the ship with Franky. Super...
/////////
The women of the crew were now walking down a path through a forested area in a comfortable silence, while in their minds they were thinking of ways to profess to Luffy in a way he'd understand.

Soon Robin had noticed that Nami had a look on her face that showed she was thinking. So she inquired," Something on your mind Miss Navigator?"

Said redhead was broken from her thoughts," Eh? No I'm fine. Just thinking."

The raven-haired women let out a smile, "About a certain rubber-man?"

Nami visibly reacted to this, she knew what she was thinking. So she countered," Like you too?"

This was one of the few times Robin's stoic facade was broken.

Nothing else was said for a while, now confirming that they shared affection for the same man seemed... almost unreal to them.

But all current thoughts ended as they left the wooded area, and several feet in front of them was....
1132.title: They find a strange island...

11321.content:
At first glance, it only looked like a cave, but the stone archway above it and the collapsed pillars around it showed it was more.

They had separate thoughts on this new discovery. Robin and her scholarly mind saw this as a new discovery, and sought to learn more about it through whatever text she could find and translate.

Nami merely thought something valuable could have been left behind.

Little did they know, the both of them, and more, would ALL get something 'very' valuable.
//////
The two have been walking through the cave for several minutes now, paying attention for anything that glittered or sparkled. Essentially something that could be handed in for a large amount of money.

Robin was paying closer attention to the wall they were walking past. They were covered in ancient hieroglyphs from a language lost to time. A few words that she was able to translate quickly roughly mentioned 'life', 'love', and 'many' of something. It also made reference to a 'treasure' of some kind, but she kept this from the navigator. Didn't want to get her hopes up.

After some more time spent walking, they finally enter a wide chamber of sorts. And in the center of the chamber was a.............
11321.title: Some ancient ruins

113211.content:
In the center of the chamber, surrounded by small canals they assumed led outside, was a stone statue, partially damaged due to the passage of time. Even without the arms or a head, it was easy to tell it depicted a woman due to certain... "features". Namely, the gigantic breasts and stomach that were attached to it.

But the real attention grabber, was what laid in the center of that, where the navel would be located.

It was a beautiful, nearly transparent gem. Even in the low light of the chamber it shined.

Almost instantly, Nami's eyes turned into Beri signs and she rushed over to claim it. She wrapped her hands around it and pulled. Although, it must have been wedged in there good because she had a bit of trouble.

While she was handling that, Robin had noticed more carvings in the nearby walls. This time there were images with the hieroglyphs.
What drew her attention was that there was a female shape with a gem in its center, and the following images depicted her stomach getting steadily bigger over time.

Then a male figure was seen kneeling with its arm on her. And he was surrounded by other similarly drawn females. And if you looked closely, the male was kneeling with its arms on her stomach. She then noticed that he wore something that looked like a crown, with what looked like a 'D' on it.

Robin believes she has deciphered the tale.

At the same time, Nami managed to pull the gem mostly out of the statue, but she lost her footing due to a loose stone and fell backwards, yanking the gem out and sending it flying..... in Robin's direction!

In that exact moment, Robin had turned around," Ms. Navigator, I believe I-" her explanation was cut off. Because against all preconceived odds, the gem Nami had found, landed perfectly in Robin's exposed navel.

Nami was fairly mortified. " I am SO sorry!" She cried out.

Robin was only fairly surprised, not expecting it, but moving past it. " It's fine Nami." She calmly replied back, actually using her name. "At least you still have it. As I was trying to say, I believe this temple was made to revere and worship some sort of fertility idol. This gem," she said unknowingly gesturing towards it, and unaware that the white bauble had begun to turn purple, "was the object of their praise and supposedly the source of the idol's power. What confuses me now is this male figure over here, the writing never mentioned this island previously having a king of any kind." She explained, moving her hand along the wall.

Nami stopped paying attention after the second sentence. The reason was quite shocking, and Robin noticed the surprised look on her face.

"What's wrong?" She asked confusedly.

"Y-y-ou're younger!" The redhead stuttered out.

Robin's eyes widened, and then she looked down towards the canals to view the reflective water. And Nami was right! While she didn't look too different, she saw that she was slightly shorter and had a more youthful air about her. She estimated herself to be Nami's age at least! But deep down, she was subconsciously elated, if this was permanent this made her closer to Luffy's age as well, and her previous thoughts about the age difference were vanishing. 'Luffy...' her thoughts went back to the rubber boy who had done more for her than she can ever hope to repay, wishing for their friendship to be more.

Then an ominous rumble echoed through the chamber. Nami looked towards the ceiling, thinking the place was unstable. But Robin blushed, she felt where it came from: her stomach. Suddenly, she felt a great heat emanate from within her, some how it made her feel sick and pleasant at the same time. She clutched at her stomach with a slight groan, the feeling growing more intense. Then she felt her hands being pushed out, causing her to look down.

To the sight of her belly steadily growing.

She let out a silent gasp, showing honest surprise one of the few times in her adult life. How this was happening, she had an idea now but before she could say anything, her belly swelled further outward eating up the surrounding space, and making her jacket rise upward and her sarong go downward, both feeling increasingly smaller.

"N-Nami...," she manages to groan out, a blush started to spread on her face. The navigator looked towards her, and instantly her face turned red and her jaw hit the floor, "Oh my...!" She couldn't help but stare at her, the jewel looking back like an eye.

Soon Robin felt the weight and grew to where she had to sit down. And then, to her increasing surprise, she could feel her already large breast grow as well as her prodigious backside and widening hips, somehow making her sitting position feel better. Robin was growing all over, and to add to her also growing shock, she felt a flurry of movement in the great swell protruding from her middle. She was pregnant. VERY pregnant. Adding to the sensations, she felt a twinge behind her navel that was just out of reach with her normal hands. Then with a loud 'POP', her navel became an outie and the jewel came out with it, flying past Nami but she paid it no heed. And like magic, the growth finally stopped, and Robin sat there on the cold floor, gravid and aroused like nothing else, cradling and rubbing what parts of her belly she could reach and using her powers to sprout arms to rub other spots. She could feel 5 new lives within her.

Nami still gaped at her. How could she not? She just witnessed her friend bloat up to enormous sizes! Her already large breast had grown to true melons, her ass was like a pair of basket balls had been stuffed into her sarong, and her belly alone was a beachball at least.

"How the hell...?" She asked stupified.

(What happens next?)
113211.title: Beautiful Gem

choices: The Expanding Adventures of The Gem
1132111.content:
Luffy had been exploring the jungle area of the island for some time now. Then he noticed the same cave the girls entered earlier. "Ooh, that looks interesting!" And then he entered as well, his footsteps not echoing through the halls.

But as he approached the girls in the chamber, he froze. His gaze completely locked on the fecund, gravid swell that was the now younger Robin's belly. Subtly watching as five of her arms stroked and rubbed what they could reach.

He flashed back to his childhood, before he had to move in with the Dadan family. He was leaving the bar one day when he bumped into a fisherman walking home with his pregnant wife. Out of pure childish curiosity, he was allowed to feel her bump. When he did, something just clicked in his mind. Even after he moved to the mountain, the image just stayed with him, though he never showed it when others where there.

He was snapped out of his triage when Nami noticed him. "Luffy!" Snapping back to his senses, he rushed over to the archeologist, "Robin, are you ok?! What happened?!" The now gravid woman was barely able to look at him, a blush dusting her cheeks. While she enjoyed the concern he showed, it would be better at ANY other situation, this one was too embarrassing for her. Nami looked on in slight jealousy, wishing his attention was on her.

Luffy then focused on her belly again, enjoying the appearance of it, but pushing that back, until he tentatively reached a hand out towards it. The moment his hand came in contact with the warm, rounded flesh, that click in his mind from 12 years ago came back, and for Robin? She let out a gasp and then a throaty moan as her bodies new residents all kicked towards his hand. They were reacting to 'daddy'.

And suddenly, it was like they both knew where to go from there.

Nami could only look on in her continually growing surprise as HER captain leaned down and placed the side of his head on top of Robin's large belly, eyes closed and a content smile on his face, while his left hand rubbed the massive orb, and his right was on the opposing side, held by Robin's while she stroked his head. Luffy has NEVER shown any sort of 'attraction' towards women in the time she has known him. 'Is THIS what he's into?!' she thought, somewhat misreading the situation. Then remembering what Robin was saying earlier, and noticed the gem on the floor behind her, and began weighing her options.

But in front of her, she heard the two talking. "Are you pleased Luffy?" Robin asked endearingly, as she guided his hand to where she felt kicks.
"I love it Robin. And I love you as well." He spoke in a mature and serious tone rarely heard from him. He punctuated his declaration with a kiss on Robin's large, outie navel, which made her gasp lightly, and then another on her lips, which she moaned into. Then she continued to for another reason. The heat she felt came back, albeit less intense, she still felt it. Then she felt her belly almost vibrate somewhat, and then it expanded slightly more. "It's quiet..." Ranma Saotome said as he and Akane walked to school, Ranma walking along the top of a fence.

The dark-haired pigtailed boy frowned. "That's just it. It's too quiet. Something usually happens by now..." he said. "At the very least, I should be a woman at this point."

Akane blinked. "Yeah, that is kinda weird..." she said. Ranma was cursed by an ancient Chinese spring to turn into a woman whenever struck by cold water. Hot water changed him back. And of all the martial artists in Nerima cursed by the springs, his was easiest to deal with. As for their normal routine, normally there was an old woman who was out watering her garden, who somehow managed to get Ranma wet every time they passed by her.

"It's never quiet," he said. "Usually the old perv is trying to steal panties by now, or Shampoo jumps me, or that asshole father of the Kunos tries something..."

Ranma suddenly shrank about a foot, becoming Akane's height. His hair became red and his chest suddenly sprouted round, perky boobs as his curse triggered, turning him into a her.

Ranma sighed, relaxing a little as she turned to the old woman who somehow always 'accidentally' turned him female on the way to school everyday.

The old woman nodded. "Sorry. I overslept today... and yeah, I have. It's just so funny to see a manly man like you turn into such a pretty girl!"

Following rumors that a genie had been spotted in Agrabah, Aladdin and his friends decided to look to see if the rumor was true. Iago had went along only because Jasmine had insisted on it. Aladdin, Abu, Genie and Iago all flew around the city on Carpet while Jasmine stayed at the palace because she had more important things to do.

"I bet Jasmine is relaxing in her chambers doing nothing," said Iago. "Just waiting to be served hand and foot!"

Abu chittrred at Iago.

"I won't let it go!" snapped Iago. "Here we are slaving away in the hot sun while Jasmine is relaxing in a lap of luxury"

"Iago, be quiet" said Aladdin.

"I wish that Jasmine was here to enjoy this lovely desert weather," said Iago, eyeing Genie. Before the blue Genie could respond, there was a poof of purplish smoke and Jasmine was there right beside Aladdin!

"Huh?" asked Jasmine. "How did I get here?"

124.content:
Once upon a time, in the magical land of Equestria, there were two sisters. Celestia, who moved the sun, and Luna, who moved the moon.

Over time, Luna, the younger, became jealous of her sister and the worship she gained. Her day was loved, while Luna's night was feared, no one staying up to witness her beautiful starscapes. She was corrupted by a dark entity, becoming the dreaded Nightmare Moon.

Celestia, filled with regret, was forced to use the holy magic of the Elements of Harmony, artifacts representing the six virtues of Magic, Honesty, Generosity, Loyalty, Laughter, and Kindness, sealing her sister in the moon for a thousand years. This act also stripped Celestia of the ability to use them. She has yet to forgive herself for what she did to Luna, despite the necessity of it.

A thousand years passed. Nightmare Moon returned, but young magic student Twilight Sparkle, a unicorn, was ready for her. She and her friends reignited the long dormant power of the Elements of Harmony, purging the corruption from Luna's mind. Sisters were reunited.

Since then, Twilight Sparkle and her friends, the young dragon Spike, the honest earth pony Applejack, the regal unicorn Rarity, the daring pegasus Rainbow Dash, the joyful earth pony Pinkie Pie, and the meek, kind-hearted pegasus Fluttershy have all gone on many adventures.

They bested the reality warping draconequus Discord, and eventually befriended him, kind Fluttershy showing the once cruel creature the value of friendship.

The wicked Queen Chrysalis, leader of the shape-shifting emotion-eaters known as the changelings, was bested as well, her attempt to use the wedding of Twilight's brother Shining Armor to his childhood friend Princess Cadance to empower herself thwarted. Later on, with the help of a changeling who didn't want to be evil and several antagonists who had reformed, Chrysalis was dethroned, the changelings switching sides.

When the legendary Crystal Empire returned, bringing with it the dreaded King Sombra, it was Twilight Sparkle and Spike who defeated him, allowing Shining Armor and Cadance to take over as the much more benevolent rulers of the Empire.

Twilight Sparkle herself managed to ascend to become an alicorn. One of her first heroic acts was to track down a former student of Celestia's, Sunset Shimmer, and help reform her, Sunset becoming a heroine in her own right.

When dread Tirek, freshly escaped from Tartarus, made his move, Twilight Sparkle and her friends, with the aid of the Discord, who finally accepted the truth of Friendship, gained an even greater power than the Elements of Harmony, putting Tirek back in his cage.

Later on, they encountered the mad cult leader known as Starlight Glimmer, who had formed a society based on stealing the Cutie Marks of ponies, the very signs of their destiny, and replacing them with a twisted, warped Equality that reduced all their abilities to the lowest common denomenator. Her cult was broken up when Fluttershy revealed Starlight had kept her Cutie Mark, Starlight fleeing after being bested. She later tried to destroy time in an attempt to get revenge on Twilight Sparkle, preventing her and her friends from ever meeting. But when shown exactly what her actions would bring, Starlight's will broke. She herself is now Twilight Sparkle's student in the art of Friendship.

Because in Equestria, friendship is magic. It requires honesty, loyalty, laughter, kindness, and generosity, and isn't always easy. But it's oh, so worth it.

All that being said, let's get all of them knocked up! Whoo!

Story 1.) (anthropomorphic ponies) Another draconequus shows up, a spirit of fertility. Discord is alarmed by her presence and tries to stop her, but he can't. Soon bellies are going to bulge with foals...

Story 2.) (normal ponies) Due to a decreasing amount of stallions, the princesses come to the uneasy conclusion that they have to increase their number somehow. With the help of King Thorax, they end up bringing in deposed Queen Chrysalis, giving her parole in exchange for her helping 'encourage' breeding between stallions and multiple mares. Chrysalis agrees, but she has her own chaos in mind, releasing a drug she uses to up her own fertility to extreme levels into the atmosphere...

1311.content:
"Targets sighted..." said a mysterious voice from a hidden place.

In the Sky Patrol, Tails and Rotor were busily working on their latest project: building a more realistic body for their friend, Nicole the AI Lynx.

The holographic feline had done a lot of good for the Freedom Fighters over the years, and they wanted to reward her. Nicole, for her part, was a little nervous. This new body would allow for more intimate action with her teammates, and be more durable in battle than her usual holograms while still allowing all her powers, but it would also carry organic weaknesses. She could dismiss them by turning back into data, but still...

"Okay, done," Rotor said, he and Tails finishing their work. Tails pressed a button, and Nicole felt a tingle go through her, her body feeling heavier.

"Try using some of your powers, Nicole," Tails said, smiling.

Nicole nodded, and summoned up a data barrier, levitating herself into the air. She put out a hand, projecting an energy burst. She took a step closer to the nearby red ring in storage, and felt it start to empower her. "All my abilities function as normal," she said. Her ears flicked. "Oh... Was that... my voice?" She giggled a little. "It sounds weird."

Rotor looked curious. "Define 'weird,'" he asked.

"It took me a moment to process it, but..." She smiled. "Yes. Normally, I hear, see, and feel things with an electronic static around them. It's very faint, but I notice it."

"Like your talking through a communicator," Rotor said.

Nicole nodded. "In this new body, though," she said, "everything feels more... realistic." She began running her fingers over various surfaces. "Like I'm more sensitive."

Her stomach grumbled. "What in the world..."

Rotor and Tails grinned. "You're hungry," Rotor said. "That's a normal reaction when someone hasn't eaten in a while."

Nicole's stomach rumbled again. "I've always wondered about eating..." she said.

Tails chuckled. "Well, it seems your body works normally," he said. "You are lacking one biological function that I think you won't miss."

"What's that?" Nicole asked.

"Let's just say that the only thing you'll ever need to use a bathroom for is bathing," Rotor said.

Nicole blinked, and nodded. "Ah. Thank you, I'd rather not have to do that..."

Tails smiled. "Your digestive system is more efficient than a normal Mobians. You can still get fat, though, and get stomachaches, so don't overeat," he said.

Nicole nodded, looking at herself. "And all my other bodily functions are the same as a normal Mobian's otherwise?" she asked.

"Nervous system, reproductive system, vascular system, all of it," Rotor said. "We wanted your new body to be as close to normal as possible."

Nicole smiled. "Then let's get some food," she said. "I always wanted to try a chilidog..."

Tails and Rotor traded triumphant looks. The three went out to join the others, Sally, Antoine, Sonic, Bunnie, Amy Rose, Big, and Cream, who were more than happy for Nicole now that she had her more realistic body. Nicole was served a chilidog... and promptly fell in love with her sense of taste, attempting to eat everything in the kitchen that was edible and promptly getting a stomachache.

"I warned you," Tails said.

"So much pain..." Nicole said, belching. "Yet taste... so wonderful..." She rubbed her bloated stomach and groaned, licking the remnants of chili and cupcake frosting off of her lips. Sally giggled, hugging her gently.

"Ah, ze perils of first time experiences," Antoine said. "You must be slow, not lose yourself in the pleasure."

Sonic snorted. "Eh. Slow isn't my thing," he said.

He couldn't resist. The setup was just too PERFECT. "Is zat why you and Sally broke up?" he asked.

Sonic's eyes narrowed. Sally headdesked, snickering. Everyone else, save for the oblivious Big the Cat and the confused Cream the Rabbit began to laugh.

"Burn. BURN!" Rotor crowed.

"...Point to you, Frenchie, but the game will be mine," Sonic muttered.

Antoine just smirked, Bunnie giving him a kiss on the cheek.

"I don't get it," Cream the Rabbit said, her chao, Cheese, playing with a ball nearby.

"Ask your mother," everyone else save for Big said in unison. Cream huffed grumpily.

"So Rote," Sonic said, deliberately changing the subject. "How's things going with your boyfriend?"

Rotor sighed. "EX-boyfriend," he said. "Caught him cheating."

Everyone winced. "Sorry Rotor..." Amy said, patting him on the back.

Rotor chuckled wearily. "Thanks... but it's okay, really. Things were going bad for us anyway, and I was thinking of calling it quits anyway. This just gave me the excuse."

Sally hugged him. "Still, we're there for you if you need us," she said.

Rotor smiled. "Thanks. Seriously, all of you, thanks for everything."

In the hidden place, the figure watched as the Freedom Fighters all chatted over various things. "Negative on Rotor for candidacy. Target is homosexual."

"Damn," muttered the voice. "First Big proves asexual, and now... One less variable... Okay, but the others?"

"In addition to Shadow the Hedgehog and Knuckles the Echidna, I believe we have viable candidates in Sonic the Hedgehog, Antoine D'Coolette, and Miles Prower, callsign Tails. Good news, though. If I read it right, then Nicole's got a body with a functioning reproductive system now," the voice said. "Over."

"The computer entity? That should be interesting... Copy that," the other voice said. "Tag the boys with the drug."

"Roger," the voice said. "I know we haven't got Knuckles yet... How's the op with Shadow? Over."

"Almost didn't make it," the other voice said. "Guy suspected something was up instead of just thinking it was a bug. The behavior modifiers took hold, though, and spread to Rouge just as planned. Now? They STILL haven't stopped fucking."

"Damn," the voice said, taking aim. "Batgirl's gonna barely be able to walk once they stop." The voice fired. Once, twice, three times.

Sonic slapped his face.

"You okay?" Sally asked.

"Bug or something must have gotten in," Sonic said. "Felt like a bug bite..."

Tails flinched, scratching at his shoulder. "Yeah, I think we let something in with us."

Antoine just grumbled, scratching at his hip where he was 'bitten.'

Rotor shook his head. "Sorry guys," he said. "I can run the filters, that should get rid of any mosquitos or anything like that."

Sonic shrugged. "No rush," he said. "It's just annoying more than anything."

Bunnie smiled, snuggling up to Antoine. "Besides, we still got things ta do, right?" she asked.

Sally nodded, glancing over to Sonic. "Right. We need to run checks on all the Egg Bosses. They've been quiet lately... Quiet bad guys makes me nervous..." she said. Although, as she looked over Sonic, she was beginning to wonder if it was nervous she felt. They'd only dated for a while, but it was a good time...

Bunnie, for her part, was feeling suddenly frisky. She just couldn't get over how happy she was with Antoine. She hugged the handsome coyote and kissed him, a sudden, silly urge to find a quiet place and fuck him silly coming over her.

Amy, meanwhile, was finding her attention drawn to Sonic more than usual. She noticed Sally looking at him, and for some reason didn't feel a sting of jealousy. After all, it was only right that a stud like Sonic have a lot of women attracted to him...

Nicole was starting to squirm, feeling a warmth between her legs as she looked at Tails. He really was a handsome young man. And her body felt so good now. All these new sensations... She wanted to experience more of them...

"Aaand confirmed," the voice said from its hiding place. "All three males are producing the behavior modifying, libido-enhancing pheromones. The women are already showing signs of attraction. Over."

"Good work," the other voice said. "We'll arrange things so that they, along with our other test subjects, get even more women to fertilize."

"Stirring up the female Egg Bosses?" the voice asked as it retreated.

"And Phage," said the other voice. "I've downloaded the files on how Nicole was given her current body. With some tweaking, I can convince Dr. Eggman that it's his idea to give Phage the ability to interact in the real world."

"Risky," said the voice. "Eggy gets apocalyptic if he thinks someone's wronged him. I don't want you killed, Commander."

"I know. But for the Experiment to work, we need as many females impregnated as possible," said the other voice.

"Godspeed," the first voice said. "I'm disembarking. I just tapped they're readouts - we're over Angel Island. I'm gonna use this chance to tag Knuckles."

I want you to have a child that was raised by someone who isn't a murderous psycho..." She frowned. "And don't tell me Talia isn't. She's the head of an 'assassin's guild' for pete's sake."

Batman sighed. He knew full well Talia's 'personality' problems, and that some of Damian's issues stemmed from how she raised him. "I know, I know... But are you sure? This is a big step..."

"I know you can be a good father, Bruce," Catwoman said, looking into his eyes. "You've done a damn good job in turning Damian into a hero, even if he still is a little jackass." Batman actually chuckled at that. Catwoman grinned. He really needs to laugh more, she thought. "But I just thought it'd be nice if you could have a chance to raise a child from the beginning... You deserve a chance to be a father without "

Batman closed his eyes. It would be nice... and seeing the look on Damian's face at the arrival of a little brother promised much amusement. Wow, he thought. I'm making jokes? I must be changing... "...Okay," he said. A smile, an actual warm smile, crossed his face. "Okay... Let's make a baby..."

Catwoman grinned, blushing happily. The plan was working. And while she wanted to jump his bones right there, she noticed something out of the corner of her eye. "...After we take down those drug dealers."

"RIGHT," Batman said, coughing and recomposing himself, getting back into character. "Work first, then pleasure."

---------------------------------

"Lois?" Superman asked as he strode into the arctic Fortress of Solitude. "Lois, how did you get here?"

"One of your robots was looking for you," said Lois from in the far lab, knowing her husband could hear her. "I asked him to take me back here. I had an idea, but I needed the Fortress' tech to help me with it."

Superman frowned, and zipped over to the lab. He found his lovely, brown-haired wife standing next to a cadre of robots working on something. He hugged Lois, and asked, "You know I'm more than willing to take you here any time you want. But what couldn't have waited until I got back?"

"I wanted to make it a surprise," Lois said. "I've done the math, and we can afford to have another kid. But considering how careful you were with me last time, I wanted to make this time... a bit more interesting for you."

Superman blinked. "How so?" he asked.

"It's a double-purpose, really," Lois said. "Ever since you went public, you've admitted you worry about your enemies coming after me. So, in the name of both fulfilling my need to be a mommy again, and to help you not worry about me, I've asked the robots to make a formula that would turn me into... well, into something that's part Amazo, part Super-Adaptoid, basically. I'll still look like me, though, so don't worry."

Superman blinked. "Wait, what?"

"It'll give me the power to copy the powers and talents of any superhuman or costumed adventurer, good or bad, I'm within twenty feet of. And if I'm as strong as you when we make love..." Lois said, deliberately trailing off and smirking. "...Well, let's just say you BETTER be going full out on me or I'll be very disappointed."

Superman blinked, a growing blush on his face. He normally had to be very careful with Lois when they made love. It made lovemaking take longer, as he had to take things slow for them both to get off. But if he could use his full strength while making love to Lois... and have those powers as an early warning system for villains... "So, how much longer for this formula to be completed?" he asked, feigning casualness.

Lois grinned. All according to plan...

15521.content:
And what is soon-to-be expecting bovine is the lucky one?

Sarah Lawson is a young Holstein woman, and has just passed her eighteenth birthday. This means that it is time to undergo a ritual to awaken the divine spark that dwells within her. This spark will tie her to Verena, goddess of fertility, harvest, and beauty, renewing the goddess’ power within the lands as well as reshaping the bovine lass in the goddess’ image.

Paige Thompson has always been an extremely small sable antelope, both in height and curves, but that is about to change. While helping to excavate a long lost temple, she uncovers an artifact that will forever change her destiny as well as the fate of everyone near her.
15521.title: Bovine choice chapter

choices: “It’s a simple matter, for you at least.”
“It will involve you and the leader of the Templars…”
“You’ll just have to eat one of us.”
155211.content:
Steam flowed off of the water, the thin mist catching the light coming through the tall narrow window. The young bovine woman hung low in the water, her nose just above the surface, while her long and wavy blood-red hair floated out around her. The water was almost scalding, but Sarah was barely aware of it, much more lost in her own thoughts. She was yet again trying to wrap her head around everything that had happened to her, as well as that was very soon to be happening. Just last week she had been working hard on her parents’ farm, helping to prepare for the coming summer months. It was raining – a light drizzle that still made the ground soft – when two women and their escorts came up the path to the farmhouse. The guards were covered from head to toe in plated mail armor, while the women were dressed in much less defensive – yet just as impressive – robes made especially to accentuate their rounded bellies. All six wore the emblem of Verena, marking them as two of the Daughters of Verena and their Templar guards.

Sarah’s mother called her in from the fields, so when the young woman showed up before the group her hands were dirty and there was mud clinging to her legs up to her knees. Despite that and the simple functional clothing she wore, the Daughters had no trouble seeing that Sarah was indeed the one they were seeking. While her parents were of average appearance, Sarah could be summed up as ravishing. Her hair cascaded down around a body that attracted attention everywhere she went: large plush breasts strained all but the baggiest of tops, while her hips were wide and blended into a round rump that made almost any seat very comfortable. And this was in spite of a young life spent in strenuous labor on a small farmstead. Sarah’s appearance alone wasn’t evidence enough however, but the daughters were able to sense the divine spark within they had followed the signs to find.

After that came a whirlwind of activity as explanations were given, and arrangements were made. Soon enough, Sarah had joined the group for the journey back to the Holy Sanctum, leaving her previous life behind. Her parents were understandably upset to see her go, but they were equally joyful about their daughter going to a better life than they could provide, as well as proud to have played a part in restoring Verena’s blessing. Sarah on the other hand was inquisitive about what her new life would entail and curious about traveling so far from home. She had only left the small farming community a few times and those trips were only to the village further up the river to help sell the family produce. Now she had traveled much, much further and she was to be at the center of a ritual to awaken the spark within her, and the Daughters were still being extremely tight lipped about what the ritual would involve. Even Elizabeth – the young woman assigned to be Sarah’s handmaiden – wouldn’t give up the secret, though she had gotten close a couple of times.

Thinking of Elizabeth finally stirred Sarah out of her whirling thoughts. Rising up slightly, the cow could see the husky standing patiently along the far wall, her glittering clothes standing out amongst the steam clouds hanging in the air. Over the past days at the Sanctum, Elizabeth had followed Sarah wherever she went, assisting her with anything and everything. No matter how much Sarah resisted and said that she didn’t need help with it all, Elizabeth persisted nonetheless. She wouldn’t even let Sarah bathe alone, though she at least gave a partial compromise and waited for the cow to finish soaking before lathering Sarah’s fur. With a muted sigh, Sarah started reaching for the soap and was unsurprised when the other quickly stepped over and took over. Stifling another sigh, Sarah leaned forward from the tub wall allowing Elizabeth access to her back. Elizabeth moaned slightly as she reached around her protruding middle, but she certainly would never even think of anything against her pregnancy. As with any of the Daughters that rose above initiate, they loved the feeling of their fruitful bodies and the life within.

“Did you have another bad night, my Lady?” Elizabeth asked, her dexterous fingers kneading Sarah’s shoulders. Sarah did have to admit that those fingers knew just where to touch to help relieve the tension.

Sarah hummed confirmation. “Unfamiliar place, unfamiliar bed,” which was the truth, but not the whole truth. She could practically see the husky nodding her head in understanding. Sarah opened her mouth to speak, but the words hung in her throat for a moment before she forced herself to go on, “Plus there is the bit that I’m going to be undergoing a ceremony today and I have only the barest idea about it.” Sarah pulled away from the husky, spinning in the water to face her. “Will you please give me some clue about it, please Elizabeth. It’s supposed to be happening in just a short time, so it can’t hurt for me to know something about what is coming…right?” She hoped the pleading look in her eyes was enough to convince the other.

Elizabeth looked torn, tucking one of the long locks of blue hair behind her pointed ear, she looked around as if expecting someone to overhear even though it was only the two of them. This gave Sarah a little hope; this might have been the closest yet.

After nibbling on her lip for a few more moments, Elizabeth gave a little groan, “You are correct, my lady, since it is so close to the time, I suppose I can give you a little bit of information about the ritual.”

Sarah tried to not look too enthusiastic about finally getting something more than the stories when she was growing up, especially since it was now going to be part of her life.
155211.title: A new life

choices: She looks rather pregnant, though not unnaturally so.
She is huge, body swollen with life beyond what should be possible.
She is enormous, so massive that she doesn’t think she can move.
1552111.content:
“It’s a simple matter, for you at least,” she started as Sarah returned to the husky’s care. “All the Daughters here at the Sanctum will gather in the Great Hall. You’ll be brought before us to the altar below the statue of Verena and Her fountain. Then the Matriarch will present you with a chalice of the divine spring. The Daughters will then offer a prayer to Verena to awaken Her blessing within you.”

“That’s all?” Sarah asked, more than a little suspicious. “That doesn’t seem so bad.”

Elizabeth put the soap to the side and started rinsing Sarah’s fur out. “It’s a bit more involved than I’m making it sound. But you needn’t worry yourself with that, my Lady.”

It wasn’t much, but it was enough to settle some of Sarah’s nerves about what was upcoming. Somewhat reassured, Sarah relented and let Elizabeth finish washing her. The husky then helped the cow out of the bath, before drying and putting the finishing touches on. Cleaned with her hair braided and a light fragrance applied, Sarah stepped out in her bed chamber.

She almost fainted the first time she saw it. That single room had more space in it than her entire family home, and each furnishing had to be worth more than her family made in a year. The bed alone was enormous, and so soft it felt like she sank into a cloud each time she touched it. And the clothes…! Styles she had only heard of and in materials she had never known. She almost felt guilty wearing any of it, as if her touch sullied the beauty of them forever. It wasn’t as if she had a choice though, any of her old clothing were deemed unbecoming of one blessed by Verena.

So she shoved her unease aside as her handmaiden pulled out a loose and flowing gown. As with the rest, it seemed to be tailored to perfection for Sarah’s shape. There was also a more than generous split down the middle of the gown that would allow her belly through, if she had one. If things worked out as she was expecting though, that would be happening soon enough. The finishing touch was an amulet adorned with a much more ornate version of the symbol worn by the Daughters and Templars. The variety of metals that made up the necklace gave it a shimmering quality that seemed magical to Sarah’s eyes.

Soon after, Elizabeth led Sarah through the vast Hall up to the immense form of Verena. The husky then retreated, leaving Sarah the focus of every eye in the chamber. Sarah gulped loud enough that she thought everyone in the room would have been able to hear it. She had no idea what she was supposed to do now, was she supposed to say something?

Rescue from the worry came from the Matriarch of the Dawn herself. “Over here, my dear. Take your place on the altar,” she called in her usual subdued and soothing tones.

Sarah moved stiff legged over to the altar and slid onto the warm stone. She was now staring up at the enormous swell of Verena’s stomach. The Goddess’s face was just visible over the curve. As usual as the relative dimensions of Verena was how her face seemed to flow and change as anyone looked at it. It seemed to be ever shifting between races and species as a reflection of Verena being the Mother of All.

“Calm yourself, my dear, this will not hurt you at all,” the Matriarch said, leaning into view and running a hand tenderly across the top of Sarah’s head. She then turned her gaze out over the hall, raising her voice a little.

Sarah paid only half a mind to the words being spoken over her. She caught bits about a new age of bounty, and restoring Verena’s blessing. Out of the corner of her eye, she could see many faces staring up at the altar…as well as her. Despite herself, Sarah felt more than a little self conscious to be the center of attention. The thin diaphanous material of her gown made her feel even more exposed than she was.

She gave a yelp and almost leapt from the stone as a hand came to rest on her shoulder. It was the Matriarch holding a thin metal cup up for Sarah. It had to be the chalice that Elizabeth had mentioned. She hadn’t realized that it was going to be happening right now. The Matriarch seemed unfazed by Sarah’s reaction, and proceeded to put a supporting hand behind the cow’s head so that she could lean up a bit to drink. The water was cool and refreshing, and unless it was just her mind playing tricks on her, there was a tingle in her throat as she gulped the water down.

The last drops of water slid down her throat and the Matriarch let her lay flat again. She then raised her arms up high, the small gems hanging from her long ears twinkling in the subdued lighting. A chorus of voices rose up, the words pleasant yet unfamiliar to Sarah.

“Breathe slow and deep now,” the Matriarch whispered before adding her own voice to the melodious chant filling the chamber.

Sarah did so, her gaze settling on the floating crystals that drifted through the air between the golden pillars. They looked so much like stars hanging in the night sky. They even started to look a little like the ones that she had spent nights lying beside the field staring up at the twinkling display. A brief frown crossed her face as the Matriarch’s porcelain skin drifted away like a cloud.

“So you are the latest to bare my gift,” an unfamiliar voice said from nowhere and everywhere at the same time. It was also familiar in some odd way, despite never hearing it before.

Sarah craned her head up to see if anyone else had seen it, but saw no sign of that. There was no sign of anyone in fact, or even the Great Hall she had been in. Instead, she was now drifting in a body of water that stretched as far as she could see in all directions. The lights above were indeed stars now as well, their thin light casting a glow over the mirror smooth and warm water around her.

“Who’s there?” Sarah asked, regretting it at once for sounding almost childish.

A soft breeze accompanied a soft laugh. “You know my name even though you have never met me.”

“Are…are you…Verena?” No, it couldn’t be. It was absurd to think that the Goddess would really speak to a lowly mortal.

And yet, the voice responded, “That I am, my daughter. And it is time for you to carry the gift you have been waiting your life for. You shall bring my blessings to your world anew.”

Sarah’s mouth went dry. She had to be going insane; there was no way this was happening. But there was no way she could explain what was happening around her either.

“Prepare yourself, Sarah, to receive my gift.”

Before she could react, the water around her started to glow before she sank beneath the surface. With a start, she realized that she could breathe fine even if it did feel a little odd. The glow continued to intensify till she had to close her eyes. The tingle from the back of her throat spread out in a flash, reaching her extremities in a moment. Unbidden, she curled into a ball, the glow and tingling growing and growing with no end in sight.

Both vanished so quickly that she almost didn’t realize it. She was lying flat again, with her back against the textured stone of the altar, that much she could tell with her eyes still shut.

“Praise Verena for her blessing,” came the Matriarch’s voice beside her again, ringing off of the high ceiling above.

A chorus of “Praise Verena,” came from the other direction. The noise rose to almost be a cheer.

“Welcome back, my dear,” the Matriarch whispered into Sarah’s ear. “Go ahead and open your eyes, and take in Verena’s gift to you.”

Sarah opened her eyes, everything spinning around before her for a moment. When it settled, she looked down at herself, a gasp escaping her throat.
1552111.title: Touched by the Goddess
